answers.answer: I put Balinitis in the search bar and came up withhttp://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmedhealth/PMH0001865/un-controled diabetes can cause it.  How are your BG numbers?

First, there are no doctors on this forum, only patients helping other patients. Speak with your doctor. If your infection is deemed severe there are no alternatives. You also can seek a second opinion.To prevent other diabetes side effects from occurring better control and management of your blood sugars are in order. Good luck -
